Damn if this story had no pornographic part, maybe the story would be really good - there would be no attachment from the MC to continue having sex with the mother. But then I also cannot ignore the role of the mother who made progress in the MC's learning, especially at the point where she wanted the MC to get along with Kotone. I see this story more as a love story than a hentai, and it is fitting to fill an empty spot in my heart of a classic love story from Japanese mangas that has been very difficult for to find recently.

I hope the writer will be kind enough to make this kind of story. Or anyone, in any form.
